question: The Reserve Bank of India going to introduce a new ________ currency note under the Coinage Act, 2011.
explanation: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) will soon introduce currency notes of one rupee denomination. It is printed by the Government of India, under the Coinage Act, 2011. The new note will have an overall colour scheme of pink and green on the obverse and reverse, in combination with other colours. The note will have the bilingual signature of Shaktikanta Das, Secretary, Ministry of Finance.
